docs.snippet: Former French president Nicolas Sarkozy has attacked the phone-tapping conducted by magistrates investigating him, breaking his silence on the subject to liken the actions to those of the "Stasi" police of former Communist East Germany....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former French president Nicolas Sarkozy has attacked the phone-tapping conducted by magistrates investigating him, breaking his silence on the subject to liken the actions to those of the "Stasi" police of former Communist East Germany.

headline.print_headline: Knicks Open Jackson Era With Seventh Straight Win
headline.main: Knicks Open Jackson Era With Seventh Straight Win

docs.snippet: Phil Jackson was given a rousing welcome home by the Madison Square Garden crowd and the gift of a victory by the New York Knicks, whose future he now oversees as the team's new chief of basketball operations....

headline.print_headline: Symantec Fires Chief Seen as Too Slow on Innovation
headline.main: Symantec Fires Chief Seen as Too Slow on Innovation

docs.snippet: The board of Symantec, the troubled antivirus company, voted to fire Steve Bennett, its chief executive, citing revenue declines and a diminished focus on new product innovation....

headline.print_headline: High Unemployment Still Haunting Military Veterans
headline.main: High Unemployment Still Haunting Military Veterans

docs.snippet: Unemployment among U.S. military veterans eased last year, government data showed on Thursday, but remained far higher than the national average rate for the civilian population....
docs.lead_paragraph: Unemployment among U.S. military veterans eased last year, government data showed on Thursday, but remained far higher than the national average rate for the civilian population.

headline.main: Obama Imposes More Sanctions on Russia

headline.print_headline: Fergie Launches Training to Help Abused Women
headline.main: Fergie Launches Training to Help Abused Women

headline.print_headline: Google Enhances Encryption Technology for Email
headline.main: Google Enhances Encryption Technology for Email

docs.snippet: Google has enhanced the encryption technology for its flagship email service in ways that will make it harder for the National Security Agency to intercept messages moving among the company's worldwide data centers....
